ghostPage.plaintext:
22 September 2021, 9am-6pm, at Glasshouse Chelsea
[https://theglasshouses.com/glasshouse-chelsea/] in New York City

Decentralized infrastructure promises a more equitable and human-oriented online
world—if we can make it compelling for people to use and make it work at scale.
Many diverse projects already exist that are building infrastructure to
decentralize various aspects of online life.

Unfinished, Project Liberty, and DSNP.org are hosting a summit focused on
bringing the vast promise of decentralized infrastructure a few steps closer to
people's everyday computing reality. We're gathering builders, architects,
visionaries, ethicists, and policy-makers for one day of facilitated
conversation and planning. Our goal is to find—and create—ways to concretely
support each other's work, through multidisciplinary interproject collaboration.
We are especially interested in projects that enable decentralized social,
storage, and identity.

This event is a facilitated conversation, not a conference. It's styled as an
Aspiration "Unconference [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unconference]". There
won't be any keynotes, panels, or sponsored content. It's just you and your
peers talking directly to each other in structured sessions about the topics you
decide are important on those days. Some of the issues we hope to cover include:

 * Trade-offs between self-sovereign, federated, and centralized approaches
 * Structuring incentives to foster an open ecosystem
 * How do we put this stuff in everybody's hands?
 * Shaping a more ethical, private, and secure next wave of infrastructure

What sets this event apart is our approach to finding solutions. We're not
looking at problems solely through a technology lens. We're building a coalition
that reflects all parts of society—artists, academics, entrepreneurs, public
servants, policy makers, journalists, and more—people who feel this is the time
for change. Tech for the common good must be built by the people who will
ultimately benefit from it.

If you're actively working on decentralizing social, identity, storage, or
related efforts, or more focused on policy, ethics, and social impact, we hope
you can join us! Contact olivia@dsnp.org for more details. And if you know
people and projects you would like to see in the room, please let us know so we
can invite them too.

The Summit immediately precedes Unfinished Live [https://live.unfinished.com], a
conference whose theme is "The Future Is Decentralized". Summit participants
will each receive a complimentary ticket to Live. We will continue the
conversation and provide opportunities for more working sessions there.

For Covid-19 precautions, this event will require masks indoors and instant
testing at the start of the day. We are mindful that there are uncertainties
surrounding present and future Covid-19 trends, and we are actively tracking
relevant indicators and policies. We ask that all our participants be fully
vaccinated. If you won't be fully vaccinated by then, we look forward to hosting
you at our next event.

While this event is in-person only, we're planning virtual gatherings in the
near future, so let us know if you're interested in an event like this but would
prefer virtual attendance.
